corpus.description: Texts from Nuclear Threat Initiative website, created by Center for Non-Proliferation Studies
corpus.name: NTI

lexUnit.definition: COD: contingent on or determined by.

sentence.text: It can take up to 30 days , dependant on temperature for a biological filter to become established .
